287b7(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/ bdag med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad med pa ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i
287b8(nyi khri): slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ phyir mi
288a1(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rang byang chub
288a2(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
288a3(nyi khri): 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
288a4(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
288a5(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam
288a6(nyi khri): par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
288a7(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa ni thob par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon par
288a8(nyi khri): rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing / rnam par dag pa ni thob par bgyi ba
288b1(nyi khri): ma lags/ mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun du mtha'
288b2(nyi khri): yas pa'i slad du gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun du mtha' yas
288b3(nyi khri): pas gzugs kun du mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom
288b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /
288b5(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun du mtha' yas pas tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
288b6(nyi khri): pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du kun du
288b7(nyi khri): mtha' yas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun du mtha' yas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
288b8(nyi khri): pa nyid kun du mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan
289a1(nyi khri): 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du rnam par dag pa'i
289a2(nyi khri): phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
289a3(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol
289a4(nyi khri): gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis kyi dbus na mi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin du
289a5(nyi khri): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol
289a6(nyi khri): gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin du rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan
289a7(nyi khri): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni/ shes rab kyi
289a8(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa gsog du 'byin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ring du spong ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so/ /rab 'byor
289b1(nyi khri): de ni ming du yang chags pa yin/ mtshan mar yang chags pa yin/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du yang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
289b2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la/ ming du 'dzin tam mtshan mar 'dzin na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha
289b3(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gsog du 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor
289b4(nyi khri): gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mtshan mar 'dzin cing / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas/ shes
289b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas/ rlom sems su byed na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gsog
289b6(nyi khri): du 'byin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ring du spong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yang
289b7(nyi khri): de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
289b8(nyi khri): smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags pa ni gang yin rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
290a1(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshor ba dang 'du
290a2(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /sbyin
290a3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
290a4(nyi khri): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong pa'o/ /zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i
290a5(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu
290a6(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i
290a7(nyi khri): bden pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa'o/ /zhes bya bar
290a8(nyi khri): 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa
290b1(nyi khri): rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas
290b2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
290b3(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas 'das pa'i chos rnams la/ 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i
290b4(nyi khri): chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
290b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa'i tshul du/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshul
290b6(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /nang stong
290b7(nyi khri): pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
290b8(nyi khri): dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang tshad med
291a1(nyi khri): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
291a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
291a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa'
291a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs
291a5(nyi khri): mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la gzugs shes bya ba 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar
291a6(nyi khri): 'du shes pa med do/ /'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /da ltar byung ba'i chos
291a7(nyi khri): rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam
291a8(nyi khri): du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no/ /'di la sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo / /tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo zhe 'am bdag gis ni bzod pa
291b1(nyi khri): zhig bsgom mo/ /bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo/ /brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan zhig la mnyam par gzhag go/ /bsam
291b2(nyi khri): gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni shes rab cig bsgom mo/ /shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am bdag gis ni bsod nams zhig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di lta bu
291b3(nyi khri): zhig bskyed do/ /bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do/ /zhe 'am bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o/ /zhe 'am bdag gis ni
291b4(nyi khri): sems can yongs su smin par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas
291b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad dang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa
291b6(nyi khri): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
291b7(nyi khri): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
291b8(nyi khri): ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa med pa dag go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
292a1(nyi khri): smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis chags par 'gyur ba yin de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
292a2(nyi khri): gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin par 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims
292a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin par 'du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi
292a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
292a5(nyi khri): pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
292a6(nyi khri): pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
292a7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
292a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba dag du 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
292b1(nyi khri): bsngo zhing / yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/
292b2(nyi khri): chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /
292b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams kyi rang
292b4(nyi khri): bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /
292b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
292b6(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /ting nge 'dzin dang /
292b7(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /
292b8(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /lam
293a1(nyi khri): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan
293a2(nyi khri): zhig / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yang dag par bstan tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed dam/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas na yang dag par
293a3(nyi khri): rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang ci nas
293a4(nyi khri): kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /
293a5(nyi khri): bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
293a6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod do/ zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do/ /bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do/ /bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do/ /bdag ni
293a7(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do/ /bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la spyod do/ /bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do/ /bdag ni bsam
293a8(nyi khri): gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do/ /bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
293b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do/ /bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do/ /bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi
293b2(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang / bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
293b3(nyi khri): bar la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par bskul bar bya/ yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya/ yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/
293b4(nyi khri): de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ gzhan bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bya'o/ /yang dag par spro ba
293b5(nyi khri): bskyed par bya'o/ /yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/ /de yang dag par bstan pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dga' ba bskyed
293b6(nyi khri): par bya ba des/ gzhan yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba skyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang
293b7(nyi khri): ba'i yang dag par bskul bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan
293b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa legs
294a1(nyi khri): so legs so/ /rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba bstan par byas/ de shin du legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
294a2(nyi khri): de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
294a3(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan
294a4(nyi khri): mar gyur pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag
294a5(nyi khri): gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
294a6(nyi khri): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams
294a7(nyi khri): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o/ /
294a8(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
294b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab
294b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma byas mngon par 'du ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par
294b3(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni
294b4(nyi khri): gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do/ /rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no/ /gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o/ /gang ma byas pa
294b5(nyi khri): de ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa shes na
294b6(nyi khri): chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
294b7(nyi khri): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma rtogs/ rnam par mi shes mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bsam gyis
294b8(nyi khri): mi khyab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pas ma shes so/ /skye
295a1(nyi khri): mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma shes so/ /pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
295a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa
295a3(nyi khri): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
295a4(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyis ma shes so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
295a5(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyis ma shes so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du
295a6(nyi khri): phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
295a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs mi dmigs pa
295a8(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
295b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
295b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes
295b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong
295b4(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi spyod na/
295b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
295b6(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de
295b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te thams
295b8(nyi khri): cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces
296a1(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/
296a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /
296a3(nyi khri): gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
296a4(nyi khri): bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya
296a5(nyi khri): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
296a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
296a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes
296a8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /
296b1(nyi khri): gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/
296b2(nyi khri): bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do/ /gang rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba
296b3(nyi khri): 'am/ bdag gam/ bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med do/ /gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am
296b4(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du
296b5(nyi khri): phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bzhi bcu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te
296b6(nyi khri): gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
296b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /pha rol
296b8(nyi khri): du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
297a1(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
297a2(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
297a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
297a4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
297a5(nyi khri): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
297a6(nyi khri): dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams
297a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no
297a8(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes
297b1(nyi khri): bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang
297b2(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
297b3(nyi khri): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
297b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par
297b5(nyi khri): bstan to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
297b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gal te
297b7(nyi khri): skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags
297b8(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
298a1(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/
298a2(nyi khri): ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
298a3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
298a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
298a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
298a6(nyi khri): dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
298a7(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /
298a8(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
298b1(nyi khri): ltar spyod na/ gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar
298b2(nyi khri): 'du shes pa med do/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid
298b3(nyi khri): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
