298b5(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
298b6(nyi khri): rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
298b7(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
298b8(nyi khri): bu chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
299a1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /rang byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa
299a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan
299a3(nyi khri): kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang
299a4(nyi khri): yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam
299a5(nyi khri): 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i legs pa 'am/ ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib
299a6(nyi khri): pa med do/ /nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba 'phel ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba
299a7(nyi khri): med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do/ /legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do/ /nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid
299a8(nyi khri): gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi
299b1(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe zhum pa dang / g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la brtson par bgyid cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so/ /
299b2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni
299b3(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /
299b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni dran pa
299b5(nyi khri): nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
299b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
299b7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
299b8(nyi khri): shes pa rnams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
300a1(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni rgyun du
300a2(nyi khri): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub ma mchis so/ /nam mkha' la ni bla na med
300a3(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o/ /bcom ldan
300a4(nyi khri): 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go
300a5(nyi khri): cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta
300a6(nyi khri): bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la
300a7(nyi khri): gdeg par 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
300a8(nyi khri): zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
300b1(nyi khri): byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag
300b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
300b3(nyi khri): 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i byings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/
300b4(nyi khri): 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te
300b5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/ gang bar mi gda'o/ /
300b6(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
300b7(nyi khri): dag 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i byings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos
300b8(nyi khri): yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma
301a1(nyi khri): mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa'am gang bar mi gda'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben
301a2(nyi khri): pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal
301a3(nyi khri): ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang
301a4(nyi khri): 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung
301a5(nyi khri): po yang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang
301a6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa yang yod/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
301a7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom
301a8(nyi khri): ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub
301b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/ de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha
301b2(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs
301b3(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /
301b4(nyi khri): bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kau shi ka
301b5(nyi khri): khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab
301b6(nyi khri): par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
301b7(nyi khri): gnas na/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba
301b8(nyi khri): rnams kyi glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar
302a1(nyi khri): rig par bya'o/ /kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de
302a2(nyi khri): ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi sgyu ma
302a3(nyi khri): dang / smig rgyu dang / rmyi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus
302a4(nyi khri): so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/ bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni
302a5(nyi khri): bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /
302a6(nyi khri): bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
302a7(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/
302a8(nyi khri): khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
302b1(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so/ /smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / /skyang ba dang bskyab
302b2(nyi khri): par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab
302b3(nyi khri): 'byor ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang /
302b4(nyi khri): sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam
302b5(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/
302b6(nyi khri): sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
302b7(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
302b8(nyi khri): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
303a1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de rmi lam rlom sems
303a2(nyi khri): mi byed/ de rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems
303a3(nyi khri): su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas rlom sems su mi byed/
303a4(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom
303a5(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
303a6(nyi khri): sum bcu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/
303a7(nyi khri): de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa
303a8(nyi khri): la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
303b1(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/
303b2(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/
303b3(nyi khri): rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
303b4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/
303b5(nyi khri): rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed
303b6(nyi khri): do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
303b7(nyi khri): pa bcwa brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/
303b8(nyi khri): de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/
304a1(nyi khri): sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa
304a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems
304a3(nyi khri): su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
304a4(nyi khri): ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /
304a5(nyi khri): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
304a6(nyi khri): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
304a7(nyi khri): pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston pa/ mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor
304a8(nyi khri): ces bya ba sha stag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du
304b1(nyi khri): phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /lho dang nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
304b2(nyi khri): zhing yang / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi
304b3(nyi khri): pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom
304b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par
304b5(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
304b6(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha
304b7(nyi khri): rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
304b8(nyi khri): pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
305a1(nyi khri): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
305a2(nyi khri): mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba
305a3(nyi khri): 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
305a4(nyi khri): gzugs bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
305a5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/
305a6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi
305a7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/
305a8(nyi khri): da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel
305b1(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug
305b2(nyi khri): ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcings shes bya ba 'am/
305b3(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams
305b4(nyi khri): cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
305b5(nyi khri): bcu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
305b6(nyi khri): bcu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par
305b7(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun 'das shes
305b8(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
306a1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
306a2(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
306a3(nyi khri): 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon
306a4(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
306a5(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces
306a6(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/
306a7(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar
306a8(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/
306b1(nyi khri): da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
306b2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/
306b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par
306b4(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/
306b5(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
306b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/
306b7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /
306b8(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
307a1(nyi khri): 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/
307a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar ston
307a3(nyi khri): par 'gyur ston nas ji zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par
307a4(nyi khri): shes pa shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i
307a5(nyi khri): chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i
307a6(nyi khri): chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
307a7(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes bya bar shin
307a8(nyi khri): du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
307b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i
307b2(nyi khri): chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag go/ /zhes shin du rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
307b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang /
307b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
307b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs
307b6(nyi khri): su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang /
307b7(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
307b8(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab
308a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs
308a2(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
308a3(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
308a4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
308a5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
308a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
308a7(nyi khri): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad
308a8(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
308b1(nyi khri): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
308b2(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /skye mched dang khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba
308b3(nyi khri): med pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
308b4(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs
308b5(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
308b6(nyi khri): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med
308b7(nyi khri): pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
308b8(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
309a1(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yongs su dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni
309a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha'
309a3(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
309a4(nyi khri): par byang ba med pa'i phyir nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
309a5(nyi khri): nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/
309a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha'
309a7(nyi khri): la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra
309a8(nyi khri): ltar/ nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/
309b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang
309b2(nyi khri): brjod du med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
309b3(nyi khri): du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
309b4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
309b5(nyi khri): yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
309b6(nyi khri): 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su
309b7(nyi khri): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
309b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad
310a1(nyi khri): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur
310a2(nyi khri): ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas
310a3(nyi khri): gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang / tshes brgyad dang /
310a4(nyi khri): bcu bzhi dang / bcwa lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs
310a5(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang ba/ tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/ gzhal du ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma
310a6(nyi khri): mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang bcwa lnga dag
310a7(nyi khri): la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po dang / tshad med pa grangs med pa/
310a8(nyi khri): bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor
310b1(nyi khri): de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi dang lha dbul po las
310b2(nyi khri): yongs su grol bar byed pa'o/ /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi
310b3(nyi khri): 'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ lan gcig
310b4(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
310b5(nyi khri): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/ de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
310b6(nyi khri): yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul
310b7(nyi khri): dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang /
310b8(nyi khri): dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che ba dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gyi
311a1(nyi khri): lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min
311a2(nyi khri): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub yod do/ /bla na med pa
311a3(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do/ /byang chub kyi
311a4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
311a5(nyi khri): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
311a6(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon
311a7(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
311a8(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do/ /de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las
311b1(nyi khri): chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
311b2(nyi khri): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang /
311b3(nyi khri): snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang che ba dang / chung che dang tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung
311b4(nyi khri): ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med
311b5(nyi khri): 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /
311b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /de bas na de ni pha rol du phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o/ /pha rol du phyin pa rin po che
311b7(nyi khri): de la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag
311b8(nyi khri): pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/
312a1(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med
312a2(nyi khri): de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol du phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor pha rol du phyin pa rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'go ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
312a3(nyi khri): gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'go ba med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa rin po che'o/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'
312a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed la/ de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'gro bar yang mi byed na/ shes
312a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
312a6(nyi khri): mngon par bsams shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing
312a7(nyi khri): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
312a8(nyi khri): 'gro'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa 'am/ yongs su ston pa 'am/ 'dzin par byed pa 'am/ 'byin par byed pa 'am/
312b1(nyi khri): skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/ 'grib par byed pa 'am/ 'phel bar byed pa 'am/ 'das
312b2(nyi khri): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bar byed pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi
312b3(nyi khri): khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
312b4(nyi khri): du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
312b5(nyi khri): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
312b6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
312b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis
312b8(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
313a1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
313a2(nyi khri): rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
313a3(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa
313a4(nyi khri): ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
313a5(nyi khri): nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tu na te/ Sha na ta thA ga /to h+ya ba da ta/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ e ba~M` bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH
313a6(nyi khri): zhus so/ / //dge'o// //bkra shis par gyur gcig /
